00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 
00008 string getConstantType(string& test) {
00009         // bug #47: '1f' is not valid, must be '1.0f'
00010         
00011         // boolean values
00012         if(test == "true" || test == "false")
00013                 return "boolean";
00014         
00015         // test int
00016         if(strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789") == test.length())
00017                 return "int";
00018         
00019         // test byte
00020         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'b' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eb") == test.length()) {
00021                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00022                 return "byte";
00023         }
00024         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'B' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eB") == test.length()) {
00025                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00026                 return "byte";
00027         }
00028         
00029         // test char
00030         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'c' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.ec") == test.length()) {
00031                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00032                 return "char";
00033         }
00034         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'C' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eC") == test.length()) {
00035                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00036                 return "char";
00037         }
00038         
00039         // test int
00040         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'i' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.ei") == test.length()) {
00041                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00042                 return "int";
00043         }
00044         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'I' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eI") == test.length()) {
00045                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00046                 return "int";
00047         }
00048         
00049         // test short
00050         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 's' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.es") == test.length()) {
00051                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00052                 return "short";
00053         }
00054         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'S' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eS") == test.length()) {
00055                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00056                 return "short";
00057         }
00058         
00059         // test float
00060         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'f' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.ef") == test.length())
00061                 return "float";
00062         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'F' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eF") == test.length())
00063                 return "float";
00064         
00065         // test double
00066         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'd' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.ed") == test.length()) {
00067                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00068                 return "double";
00069         }
00070         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'D' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eD") == test.length()) {
00071                 test = test.substr(0, test.length() - 1);
00072                 return "double";
00073         }
00074         
00075         // test long
00076         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'l' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.el") == test.length())
00077                 return "long";
00078         if(test[test.length() - 1] == 'L' && strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.eL") == test.length())
00079                 return "long";
00080         
00081         // test quad
00082         if(strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789.e") == test.length())
00083                 return "quad";
00084         
00085         // test hexadecimal
00086         // !C002
00087         if(test.length() > 2 && test.substr(0, 2) == "0x" &&
00088            strspn(test.c_str(), "+-0123456789xabcdefABCDEF") == test.length()) {
00089                    if(atol(test.c_str()) > 0x80000000)
00090                            return "long";
00091                    return "int";
00092            }
00093         
00094         return "<unknown>";
00095 }
